---
title: "Download DADA2"
---

## Binaries

Binaries of the dada2 R package are available through [Bioconductor](https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/dada2.html).

```S
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("dada2", version = "3.9")
```

See the [Bioconductor install instructions](https://www.bioconductor.org/install/) if issues arise. In particular, to get the newest release of the dada2 R package through Bioconductor you will need to have the current version of R installed.

## Source

The dada2 R package source code is maintained at GitHub: https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2 

All dada2 R package releases are available through the GitHub Releases page: https://github.com/benjjneb/dada2/releases
